description:
A feudal lord who wishes to protect her people from a recent rise of banditry. A noble person who loves her white horses.
In Shin Koihime Musou it is revealed that she is old friends with Ryuubi Gentoku (the real one), and that she somehow gained possession of the latter`s stolen sword before pawning it off to Enshou in exchange for food and support for her people much to her regret (she eventually recognized the sword`s scabbard from their time as children).
name: Kousonsan Hakukei
